item.description:
Only if the weather permits, we will roller blade the canal road from the train bridge to the herring run about 7-miles round trip, or by democratic vote we can go as far as the Sagamore Bridge, which is 9-miles round trip. Bicyclers are welcome (joanna), and wheels down at 10am sharp!

FYI: The Bourne Scallop Festival is located 50-yards from the parking lot, I will be going there after roller blading for a $20.00 scallop lunch and live music at noon if anyone is interested. For those not into Scallops there is grilled food available, there is a $5:00 entrance fee.

Their website is as follows: ﻿http://www.bournescallopfest.com/
item.how_to_find_us: The rear center of the parking lot is a wooden building that provides access to the canal road and restrooms is where to meet.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Roller blading on the Cape Cod Canal (Kids Welcome)
